resources.string: Mega Knight is a mighty beast with 3992 hit points and 268 damage. His speed is medium.

She has extremely high damage and hit points but is very slow and easy to distract with swarms, often requiring splash support. For 7 Elixir and her very high stats, shes very reliable for defense and tanking, and can devastate towers.

For 4 Elixir, this dragon has moderately high health and high damage. For 2 Cycles, if his Evolution is activated, he will gain a nice pair of goggles alongside a transparent fuel tank and unlock a new ability the Beam Momentum.

A powerful glass cannon for 4 Elixir, the Lumberjack provides high damage and speed with moderate hitpoints. For 2 cycles, if his Evolution is active, after dropping his Rage, he will raise from the dead in the form of a spooky ghost.

For 5 Elixir, he provides insane value with moderately high hitpoints and a sharp piercing axe that damages everything, ground or air, in its path for 4 tiles. On top of that, his axe returns, dealing another swing of damage on the way back to him, dealing much more!

For 4 Elixir, this drill can pop up anywhere in the arena and start releasing Goblins. Upon destruction, it spawns 2 more! For 2 Cycles, if its Evolution is active, the Goblins will go under ground two times that when not next to the Crown Tower, will appear at the same spot
Shoot into the sky with a 3 Elixir rain of Arrows. Its moderate damage and large radius makes clearing swarms and weak enemies a breeze, but is lackluster against higher health units like the Knight.

The Goblin Barrel is an Epic card that is unlocked from the Arena 6. It is a spell, once the spell has hit the ground, it spawns three Goblins. It is a wooden barrel with a Goblin logo on it. A Goblin Barrel card costs 3 Elixir to deploy.

Fragile but fast flying units, Bats can attack both ground and air units and their strong bites can easily deal with solo mini tanks. At just 2 Elixir, Bats can fortify and cheapen your deck. For 2 Cycles, if their Evolution is active, then they become VAMPIRE bats, granting them a new power called Life Leech, healing themselves whenever they attack!
A 2 Elixir high damage and medium ranged splash troop.
The Boss Bandit is a Champion card that is unlocked from the Royal Crypt (Arena 17). It spawns a single target, ground targeting, melee, ground troop with high hitpoints and high damage.

The Cannon is a Common card that is unlocked from the Barbarian Bowl Arena 3. It spawns a single target, ground targeting, medium ranged, building with moderate hitpoints and moderate damage. It appears as a cannon atop a metal platform with a wooden base that have legs connected by ropes. A Cannon card costs 3 Elixir to deploy.

The Electro Wizard is a Legendary card that is unlocked from the Electro Valley Arena 11. It spawns a fast, multi target, air targeting, medium ranged, ground troop with moderate hitpoints and moderate damage.An Electro Wizard card costs 4 Elixir to deploy.

This former Archer has turned rebellious, bringing a firework to cause havoc in the arena, just to lit up the showdowns! While frail for 3 Elixir, she will push herself back with every attack.For 2 Cycles, if her Evolution is active, she gets fired up. Both her initial attack and her shrapnel fires lands sparks which deal damage around an area, and even slows down the movement speed of opposing troops!
Chill out! This wizard has moderate hitpoints, deals low area damage that slows units and spawns with frost around him that slows enemies (and also deals tiny damage to boot). For 3 Elixir.
A moderate damage single target melee troop.

It rolls. It crushes. It knocks back. It makes those heads roll. It is none other than The Log. Arena floor, dealing moderate damage and knocking back every enemy ground unit in its path for just 2 Elixir.
The Magic Archer is a Legendary card that is unlocked from the Arena 13. It spawns an area damage, air targeting, long ranged, ground troop with moderate hitpoints and moderate damage.

The ability to snipe towers, its moderate hi tpoints, and the light cost of 4 Elixir make this building versatile, though its incredibly slow hit speed means it often needs additional support against any unit. For 2 Cycles, if its Evolution is active, a new ammunition arrives: Goblins!

A consistent 4 Elixir single target shot attacking both air and ground with fairly average stats. For 2 Cycles, if her Evolution is active, she will gain a scope, that will let her shoot enemies INFINITELY away from her vertically.

The Princess is a Legendary card that is unlocked from the Arena 11. It spawns an area damage, air targeting, very long ranged, ground troop with low hitpoints and moderate damage.A Princess card costs 3 Elixir to deploy.

The Ram Rider is a Legendary card that is unlocked from the Arena 11. It spawns a single target, building targeting, melee, ground troop with high hitpoints and high damage. After she travels 2 tiles, she will begin to charge towards her target, and deals double damage if she hits the target whilst charging. A Ram Rider card costs 5 Elixir to deploy.

The Royal Giant is a Common card that is unlocked from the Royal Arena Arena 7. It spawns a slow, single target, building targeting, medium ranged, ground troop with high hitpoints and high damage.A Royal Giant card costs 6 Elixir to deploy.

Fifteen skeletons for just 3 Elixir this massive swarm can overwhelm single target enemy units in the blink of an eye! However, with their very low hit points, they can be easily taken out by area damage or even several ranged units, so theyâ€™re best used on defense with caution.

The Skeleton King is a Champion card that is unlocked from the Arena 16. It spawns an area damage, ground targeting, melee, ground troop with high hitpoints and moderate damage. Being a Champion card, he will stay out of the players card cycle while he is deployed, and only return once he is defeated. A Skeleton King card costs 4 Elixir to deploy, and his ability costs an additional 2 Elixir to activate.

Three fast, low damage single target melee troops. They can distract enemies when timed right or just exist to cycle your deck for the cheap price of 1 Elixir! For 2 Cycles, if their Evolution comes active when they attack, another Evolved Skeleton with a fresh ushanka gets summoned

For 4 Elixir, it has moderate health and damage, pulling everything to itself, so that it can zap enemies, although it will not stun like most electric based cards do. For 2 cycles, if its Evolution is active, the Tesla accumulates so much voltage, that it will begin to release all that it accumulated.

A 4 Elixir powerhouse with high health. This tough mini tank swings her axe 360 to take out swarms and support troops alike.For 2 Cycles, if her Evolution is active, every time she attacks, her axe spins also summon a whirlwind, pulling both ground and air units alike, dealing an additional damage value.

For 5 Elixir, the Wizard burns foes on the ground and in the air with heavy hitting fireballs that deal splash damage.For 1 cycle, if his Evolution is active, the Wizard exchanges his stylish hair in order to become studious of the arcane art of a spell shield, giving him extra protection from all sources of damage.
